title: (Wed Full Show) Tiera Kennedy on The Today Show with Bobby Today and Talks New Music + The Show Competes in Blind Boy Band Karaoke! + Testing Amy's Learners Permit Knowledge
itunes:title: (Wed Full Show) Tiera Kennedy on The Today Show with Bobby Today and Talks New Music + The Show Competes in Blind Boy Band Karaoke! + Testing Amy's Learners Permit Knowledge
description:
Tiera Kennedy is on The Today Show today with Bobby as he co-hosts with Hoda. Plus, she shares who her mentors are and new music! Amy's daughter is taking her learners permit test at home, so we test Amy's driving test knowledge. We play Blind Boy Band Karaoke where we put Boy Bands songs on the wheel. Whatever song it lands on, the person has to perform the song but with NO LYRICS!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
